Text:
There is a row of Santa costumes on the table. Each
one of them is school-approved—in other words,
they are designs sanctioned by the faculty.

Members of the Holiday Committee are to wear Santa
costumes and liven up the party. I do think that's a
good policy. However...

All of the committee members apart from Alexia are
choosing what they will wear on the day of the party.

Hey, check out this costume! It's so fluffy and cute!
I'm gonna wear this one!

Oh, the school-issued ones don't show very much
skin... They're really boring, too.

Yeah, just look at the skirt on this one. It's like...
baggy pants? I'd rather die than wear that.
So cringe!
You're absolutely right!
Huh?!
P-Princess Alexia?
The schoolgirls stare at Alexia in surprise.
S-Sorry, it's nothing... Ahem!

You're absolutely right. They're all very dull for
my tastes. They're more than just cringe, they're...
childish?

The fabric is way too thick, too—they're like mascot
costumes. And I don't think a design that covers your
skin is a bad thing. I really don't...but this just isn't it.

Do they really expect me to wear this? Nope. Not
happening. If it came down to it, I'd sooner wear
my school uniform than this.

Which is fun to say and all...but I can't be the only
committee member in my uniform.

(But if I wear my school uniform in protest over the
bad Santa costumes, everyone will think I'm not a
team player.)

I guess that leaves me with only one choice. And if
I'm gonna do it, I might as well go all-out...

Welcome, Princess Alexia. How might we serve you
today?

I heard that Mitsugoshi does custom-made clothes.
So I came to request a Santa costume.

I know there isn't much time left until the holidays,
but I don't want to compromise. Anyway, could I
ask you to make me the best costume you can?

(Even I know this is a tall order. Between the time
constraint and the order being custom-made,
you might as well call it impossible.)
(But Mitsugoshi just might be able to do it...)
As you wish, Princess.
You can actually do it?!
Yes, we certainly can.

Mitsugoshi uses a super-speed production service.
We can have not only clothing, but all other sorts
of products made at impossible speeds, in order
to provide them to our valued customers.
Except...

I know. I'm making an impossible demand.
I assume there's a huge rush fee?

But I don't care how expensive it is. I want the best
you can give me.
Oh, no, I wasn't talking about the fee...
Huh? You weren't?

Alexia had already expected to spend a month's-worth
of living expenses for the average commoner—she is a
bit taken aback by the answer.

I would love to give you the "best costume" you've
requested. But to be honest...

While we can provide you with the best fabrics, of
course, we will need you to be more specific on the
design you want...otherwise, we cannot possibly
know what you consider to be "the best."
Y-You're right.

Well, anything unfashionable is absolutely off
limits. Also, I want it to be super-cute and sexy
and—

Yeah...I do want to show a little skin...but not too
much. That would be considered indecent. I'll let
you determine where that line is.
If you would please wait just a moment.

At the shop staff's signal, a different clerk emerges
from the back. The first clerk repeats everything I
said, and the new clerk swiftly sketches a design.

Yeah, that's right. Cuteness is important, but if
it's too cute, I'll look too childish, won't I?
And add a little sexiness there...yeah. Good.

(That's Mitsugoshi for you. They created a perfect
design from my vision.)
What do you think, Princess?
It's good. Exactly what I envisioned...but...

If something displeases you, please don't hesitate to
say so.
Well...yeah, I want one more thing...
Next question. Do you like all this Santa stuff?

Is that kind of question okay? Well, for the right
price, I'll answer anything you want.
Well, of course I like Santa. Who doesn't?
S-Sure...

(It's clear he likes Santa with all his heart... Yes.
That's just how much he likes Santa costumes!)

I also want...umm...for it to be easy to move in...
and, if you can...could you make it...as Santa-ish
as possible?

Santa-ish...you say? But I think it's already very
Santa-like.

Oh! That's not what I meant. I know, I'm saying such
strange things.

I don't want it to just be a design in a red and
white motif. I'm talking about an old man with
a white beard.

In other words...you want your costume to be closer
to the actual Santa? As in, the old guy?

N-No! That's not what I meant... I want to retain the
cuteness, but bring in a little authenticity... Only if
it's possible, of course.

You know those big events where people dress as
Santa and give out presents, right?

I thought it would be a bit of a betrayal to make
Santa too cute...so I revised my vision a little.

I want to have a costume that really respects the
Santa tradition... So? Can you do it?

Respect, you say... I do think it's possible, but
could you wait a moment, please?

The clerks scurry to the back room with the
sketch book.

(They must be discussing it in there. Maybe I went
too far.)
(That noise coming from the back room...what is it?)

Thank you for your patience, Princess. Here is the
costume you requested.

We kept the original design as a base, then we
emphasized the Santa features as per your
request. Does it meet with your approval?

She smiles and holds up something...it is the
completed Santa costume.
Huh? It's...done?

Yes. This is Mitsugoshi's super-speed production
service.

(Speed doesn't even begin to describe it... They went
from the design phase to the completed costume in a
matter of minutes. Mitsugoshi...is a force to be
reckoned with.)

In addition to costumes, we also can create weapons
with an exclusive design for dark knights such as
yourself. Would you be interested in that service?
Wait, you even make exclusive weapons?

Yes. Our dark knight customers desire to have their
weapons with them at all times, so we wish to cater
to their needs.

Ah, that makes sense. Okay, I'll take that exclusive
weapon there, too.

Understood, Princess. We will have your weapon
prepared by the time you are ready to leave.
In the meantime, would you please try on
your costume?
S-Sure...

Please use this changing room over here. We will give
you some privacy.
Thank you.

Alexia slips her arms through the newly-made Santa
costume.

Ooh...it's really comfortable. For something they
made so quickly, the size fits perfectly. Everything
about it feels fine.

And also...it's really cute. It retains a proper
Santa-ness...but it's still very cute.

Happy Holidays! Were you a good boy, Pooch? Heehee!
Since you said you liked Santa, I wore this special outfit,
just for you. You're welcome.
Or something like that...

Hmm...but aren't I just being my usual self? It's the
holidays. I should do something more festive. That
would really make him smile.

Wait...why'm I going through all this trouble trying
to make stupid Pooch smile anyway.

He should feel grateful that he even gets to see me
in a Santa costume.
Princess Alexia, do you like it?
Oof!
Y-Yes, it's acceptable... I will take it.

I can't wait for the holiday party. I'm sure Pooch won't be
able to take his eyes off me when I'm dressed like this!
